publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1712 John Farquhar Munro: Environmental Protection (Restriction on Use of Lead Shot) (Scotland) (No.2) Regulations 2004â€”That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Environmental Protection (Restriction on Use of Lead Shot) (Scotland) (No.2) Regulations 2004 (SSI 2004/358).
